## Checklist (must be completed)
- [ ] Path follows `packs/<tech>/...`, `templates/<category>/<name>` or `libraries/<category>/<name>` (kebab-case).
- [ ] Required files present: pack root has `metadata.yaml`, `README.md`, `LICENSE`; nested items have no README; standalone items include `metadata.yaml`, `README.md`, `LICENSE`.
- [ ] Metadata lint passes locally (or explain).
- [ ] Wiki catalog update added (link) or noted below.

Link to the wiki change or describe what needs updating.
